page.title: 01AMPTHILL_THE LOCALITY
page.content: { The Ampthill block}extends from the {Millbrook Proving Ground}in the east, to{Houghton Park}and{Ampthill town}in the west. The town of Ampthill is situated at the centre of the county and was ideally situated to grow as a{market {town}and from then as a centre of population.The town itself has several interesting historical connections, in particular{Katherine of Aragon}who was in residence at Ampthill Castle when her marriage to Henry was annulled. Local Industry includes the Vauxhall Proving Ground at Millbrook,Huntings Engineering and many small independent light industrial enterprises. Residents who were interviewed for this project declared themselves fairly happy with the area, although younger people thought there could be more of interest for them.
